quote: It does not do to dwell on dreams and forget to live.
Happiness can be found even in the darkest of times, if one only remembers to turn on the light.
The ones that love us never really leave us.
We are only as strong as we are united, as weak as we are divided.
It is our choices, Harry, that show what we truly are, far more than our abilities.
Love is the strongest force in the universe, and it protects us, and it makes us stronger than we could ever be on our own.
It is impossible to manufacture or imitate love.
I solemnly swear that I am up to no good.
There are some things you can't share without ending up liking each other.
Hogwarts is my home.
Just because you have the emotional range of a teaspoon doesn't mean we all have.
Indifference and neglect often do much more damage than outright dislike.
It is a curious thing, Harry, but perhaps those who are best suited to power are those who have never sought it.
The best of us sometimes eat our own words.
Dark times lie ahead of us and there will be a time when we must choose between what is easy and what is right.
It is the unknown we fear when we look upon death and darkness, nothing more.
The truth is a beautiful and terrible thing, and should therefore be treated with great caution.
I solemnly swear I am up to no good.
We could all have been killed - or worse, expelled.
If I were You-Know-who, I'd want you to feel cut off from everyone else. Because if it's just you alone you're not as much of a threat.
I never knew your mother, but from what I heard she was a remarkable woman. And from what I can tell, you're very like her.
I was the one who suggested You-Know-who should create a secret keeper. It was the best way to protect the secret, as only one person would know the true place to find you.
That's very true. Of course, I don't expect you to understand. You're too young. But you will. Someday. You'll understand that love is the most powerful thing in the universe.
Don't you two ever listen to anything? What if I hadn't been able to get rid of that? You could have been killed, or worse, expelled.
You're the one who's always telling us to think for ourselves, and now you're telling us to do exactly the opposite.
Of course it is happening inside your head, Harry, but why on earth should that mean that it is not real?
Differences of habit and language are nothing at all if our aims are identical and our hearts are open.
The wand chooses the wizard, Mr. Potter. It's not always clear why.
Do not pity the dead, Harry. Pity the living, and above all, those who live without love.
Of course it is happening inside your head, Harry, but why on earth should that mean that it is not real?

You are the true master of death, because the true master does not seek to run away from Death. He accepts that he must die, and understands that there are far, far worse things in the living world than dying.
Where your treasure is, there will your heart be also.
Not my daughter, you bitch!

You think the dead we loved ever truly leave us? You think that we don't recall them more clearly than ever in times of great trouble? Your father is alive in you, Harry, and shows himself plainly when you have need of him.
Indeed, your failure to understand that there are things much worse than death has always been your greatest weakness.
I say there are spots that don't come off… Spots that never come off Snape, d'you know what I mean.
Nothing like a night time stroll to give you ideas
If you want to know what a man's like, take a good look at how he treats his inferiors, not his equals.
Curiosity is not a sin… But we should exercise caution with our curiosity… yes, indeed.
In dreams, we enter a world that's entirely our own.
To the well-organized mind, death is but the next great adventure.
We must try not to sink beneath our anguish, Harry, but battle on.
It is the unknown we fear when we look upon death and darkness, nothing more.
Ah, music. A magic beyond all we do here!
People find it far easier to forgive others for being wrong than being right.
Age is foolish and forgetful when it underestimates youth.
When you have seen as much of life as I have, you will not underestimate the power of obsessive love.
It takes a great deal of bravery to stand up to our enemies, but just as much to stand up to our friends.
Fear of a name increases fear of the thing itself.
You sort of start thinking anything's possible if you've got enough nerve.
Hearing voices no one else can hear isn't a good sign, even in the wizarding world.
Never trust anything that can think for itself if you can't see where it keeps its brain.
As much money and life as you could want! The two things most human beings would choose above all – the trouble is, humans do have a knack of choosing precisely those things that are worst for them.
There is no good or evil: only power and those too weak to seek it.
The mind is not a book, to be opened at will and examined at leisure. Thoughts are not etched on the inside of skulls, to be perused by an invader. The mind is a complex and many-layered thing.
Youth cannot know how age thinks and feels. But old men are guilty if they forget what it was to be young.

He chose the boy he thought most likely to be a danger to him … and notice this, Harry. He chose, not the pureblood (which according to his creed, is the only kind of wizard worth being or knowing), but the half-blood, like himself. He saw himself in you before he had ever seen you, and in marking you with that scar, he did not kill you, as he intended, but gave you powers, and a future, which have fitted you to escape him not once, but four times so far.
Numbing the pain for a while will make it worse when you finally feel it.
Time is making fools of us again.
Funny way to get to a wizards' school, the train. Magic carpets all got punctures, have they?
Troll - in the dungeons - thought you ought to know.
Training for the ballet, Potter?
Of all the trees we could've hit, we had to get one that hits back.
You will also find that help will always be given at Hogwarts to those who ask for it.
Honestly, if you were any slower, you'd be going backward.
Dobby has never been asked to sit down by a wizard - like an equal.
I'll be in my bedroom, making no noise and pretending I'm not there.
Don't let the muggles get you down.
Mr. Moony presents his compliments to Professor Snape, and begs him to keep his abnormally large nose out of other people's business.
I solemnly swear that I am up to no good.
Fawkes is a phoenix, Harry. Phoenixes burst into flame when it is time for them to die and are reborn from the ashes.
Are you insane? Of course I want to leave the Dursleys! Have you got a house? When can I move in?
Mischief Managed!
Why, dear boy, we don't send wizards to Azkaban just for blowing up their aunts.
Your devotion is nothing more than cowardice. You would not be here if you had anywhere else to go.
Just because it's taken you three years to notice, Ron, doesn't mean no one else has spotted I'm a girl!
Anyone can speak Troll. All you have to do is point and grunt.
Twitchy little ferret, aren't you, Malfoy?
Wit beyond measure is man's greatest treasure.
Don't worry. You're just as sane as I am.
Yeah, Quirrell was a great teacher. There was just that minor drawback of him having Lord Voldemort sticking out of the back of his head!
Youth can not know how age thinks and feels. But old men are guilty if they forget what it was to be young.
You should write a book, translating mad things girls do so boys can understand them.
Ron - you are the most insensitive wart I have ever had the misfortune to meet.
Once again, you show all the sensitivity of a blunt axe.
Dumbledore says people find it far easier to forgive others for being wrong than being right.
You need your friends, Harry.
He can run faster than Severus Snape confronted with shampoo.
I always said he was mental. Brilliant and everything, but cracked.
Always.
Ron, you know full well Harry and I were brought up by Muggles!
It matters not what someone is born, but what they grow to be.
The consequences of our actions are always so complicated, so diverse, that predicting the future is a very difficult business indeed.
Snape's patronus was a doe, the same as my mother's because he loved her for nearly all of his life, from when they were children.
Do not pity the dead, Harry. Pity the living, and, above all those who live without love.
Albus Severus, you were named for two headmasters of Hogwarts. One of them was a Slytherin and he was probably the bravest man I ever knew.
Until the very end
Books! And cleverness! There are more important things - friendship and bravery.
We're with you whatever happens.
No good sittin' worryin' abou' it. What's comin' will come, an' we'll meet it when it does.
Every human life is worth the same, and worth saving.
There's things more importan' than keepin' a job.
Sadly, accidental rudeness occurs alarmingly often. Best to say nothing at all, my dear man.
We've been hearing explosions out of their room for ages, but we never thought they were actually making things. We thought they just liked the noise.
You know, Minister, I disagree with Dumbledore on many counts... but you cannot deny he's got style...
Dobby is free
Accio Brain!
I think we've outgrown full-time education... Time to test our talents in the real world, d'you reckon?
I mean, it's sort of exciting, isn't it, breaking the rules?
We've all got both light and dark inside us. What matters is the part we choose to act on. That's who we really are.
It is the quality of one's convictions that determines success, not the number of followers.
To have been loved so deeply, even though the person who loved us is gone, will give us some protection forever.
Alas! Ear wax!
Amazing! Amazing! This is just like magic!
We're coming with you. That was decided months ago - years, really.
You shall not harm Harry Potter!
Such a beautiful place this is, to be with friends, Dobby feels joy for being with his friends, Harry Potter.
